content:
Assign a Broadcast Topic to a Network Site

To let users add a broadcast site banner to your Aura and LWR sites, assign a broadcast topic to one or more network sites. Assigning the broadcast topic to a network site creates a link between a broadcast topic and your Experience Cloud sites.

Before you assign a broadcast topic to a network site, create a broadcast topic. From a broadcast topic record, select the Assign to Networks quick action. Select one or more network sites that users can add a broadcast site banner to based on the selected broadcast topic. Click Assign.
title: Service Cloud Broadcast Communications Setup
